title: Wildflowers of Australia: Flowers and Their Habitats
creator_credit: EVP Television, Ross Wurst and Joyce Haynes
brief_description: A video panorama of native flora from the wetlands, woodlands, grasslands, arid and coastal heathlands of Australia. The wildflowers presented in this video have been filmed on location across Australia, over a period of many years, and in many cases have been difficult to identify.
